LanguageData.SteelArm.label: steel arm
LanguageData.SteelArm.description: A very poor arm replacement. Looks bad, feels bad, is bad.
LanguageData.EyePatch.label: eye patch
LanguageData.HookHand.label: hook hand
LanguageData.HookHand.description: Replaces missing hands. Pretty scary. Yarr.
LanguageData.denture.label: denture
LanguageData.denture.description: Replaces a missing jaw with wooden teeth. Smells a bit.
LanguageData.PegLeg.label: peg leg
LanguageData.PegLeg.description: Replaces a missing leg with a wooden one. Out of fashion but it does its job pretty well.
LanguageData.WoodenFoot.label: wooden foot
LanguageData.WoodenFoot.description: Replaces missing feet with a wooden log. At least it's more comfortable than hopping around.
LanguageData.EarBandage.label: ear bandage
LanguageData.EarBandage.description: Covers a missing ear. Look like a certain unsuccessful 19th century artist!
